description: Refreshing, vivacious and inventive first film about a bright but naive young country woman who comes to the city to experience excitement and romance.
keywords: male frontal nudity,male nudity,male rear nudity,female nudity,skinny dipping
name: I Love Budapest

review.name: misses cool chic, lapses into absurdity
review.reviewBody: basically, a rural girl moves to the big city and hangs out with all the wrong people, like a friend who gives blow jobs to wanna be gangsta's, a security guard guy who acts like a hick, but almost rapes the lead and other small time totally stupid criminals...i do not recommend this movie at all, it's not real by any angle. in its depiction of the rural to city move or in terms of any of the people in the film. the dialogue doesn't make sense many times and the scenes are choppy. the only rescuing grace is that it's hungarian and gives us a small glimpse of what goes on over there. oh! the end is the worst ever, i can't tell you what it is, but you are definitely going to go what the hell!!!! geocities.com/free_love98
